CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(LoggerAlert__r.SourceSObjectType__c), 'LogEntryEvent__e', HYPERLINK(LogEntryEventLoggedById__c, LogEntryEventLoggedByUsername__c, '_top'), 'Log__c', HYPERLINK(Log__r.LoggedBy__c, Log__r.LoggedBy__r.Username, '_top'), 'LogEntry__c', HYPERLINK(LogEntry__r.Log__r.LoggedBy__c, LogEntry__r.Log__r.LoggedBy__r.Username, '_top'), 'LogEntryTag__c', HYPERLINK(LogEntryTag__r.LogEntry__r.Log__r.LoggedBy__c, LogEntryTag__r.LogEntry__r.Log__r.LoggedBy__r.Username, '_top'), 'Unknown' )
CustomField.label: Logged By
